title: High Ping no other problems with anything else
body:
I get really high ping spikes only in league, no other games have this problem (GTA V, EU4, CSGO, etc.). I did a tracert, and is that 152 a problem and what could i do to fix it.


Tracing route to www.google.com [172.217.3.36]
over a maximum of 30 hops:

  1   152 ms     1 ms     2 ms  FIOS_Quantum_Gateway.fios-router.home [192.168.1.1]
  2     4 ms     4 ms     4 ms  lo0-100.BLTMMD-VFTTP-322.verizon-gni.net [71.179.255.1]
  3     7 ms     7 ms    10 ms  B3322.BLTMMD-LCR-22.verizon-gni.net [100.41.219.0]
  4     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  5     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  6     8 ms    11 ms    10 ms  0.et-10-1-0.GW13.IAD8.ALTER.NET [140.222.235.215]
  7     8 ms     9 ms    14 ms  204.148.79.46
  8     8 ms    10 ms     9 ms  108.170.246.65
  9     7 ms    10 ms     9 ms  209.85.246.159
 10    11 ms    10 ms    10 ms  iad23s57-in-f4.1e100.net [172.217.3.36]

Trace complete.

replies.body: If this is formatted in the way I'm used to, that 152ms at 192.168.1.1 means that your connection is running into some issues before it even leaves your home network. Since it's happening within your own network, we should be able to adjust a few [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to smooth out that ping. Let me know if that helps or not, and we can go through a few more steps.
